hero.label: Private Label Manufacturing
hero.title: Launch Your Own Moroccan Beauty Brand
hero.description: We manufacture premium, 100% organic skincare and haircare products under your private label.

intro.label: Premium Quality
intro.title: Moroccan Organic Beauty Products - Private Label
intro.description1: Moroccan organic beauty products are among the best options for standing out in the market. If you're looking for high-quality, skin- and hair-friendly products that draw their power from the Moroccan environment, our products are the ideal choice.
intro.description2: We offer you the opportunity to launch your own private label of natural Moroccan beauty products, distinguished by their effective formulas and 100% organic ingredients, making them suitable for all skin and hair types.

features.title: Guaranteed Quality
features.description: Rigorous quality control on Argan oil, Sidr powder, and Rose oil. Every product undergoes testing to ensure effectiveness and safety.

features.title: Skin Rejuvenation
features.description: Formulas rich in vitamins and antioxidants for lasting radiance. Naturally brightens skin and reduces wrinkles.

features.title: Hair Nourishment
features.description: Strengthens and hydrates using traditional ingredients like argan oil. Stimulates growth and gives natural shine.

features.title: Environmental Protection
features.description: Rich in fatty acids and Vitamin E to protect skin and hair from pollution and harmful sun rays.

advantages.title: Unique Advantages of Private Label
list: Protection against Wrinkles and Signs of Premature Aging
Balanced Formulas for Dry, Oily, and Normal Skin
Suitable for All Skin Types, Including Sensitive Skin

process.label: Simple Process
process.title: How to Start with Private Label

steps.title: Selection
steps.description: Choose from our wide range of pre-set organic formulas or request a custom blend tailored to your market.

steps.title: Branding
steps.description: We help design distinctive logos and packaging that reflect your brand vision and identity.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Receive fully certified, professionally packaged products ready for your market.

conditions.note: Surcharge applies, or submit your own

compliance.title: Export Regulation Notice
compliance.description: Customs do not allow the export of unlabeled cosmetic products. All products must have at least removable stickers to avoid customs issues. We provide labeling in multiple languages at no extra cost.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Organica Group is your flexible manufacturing partner. From 100 units to thousands, we support your growth every step of the way.
